Uses of Package
checkersMain

Packages that use checkersMain
checkersBoard Provides several implementations of the CheckersBoard abstract class with different strengths and weaknesses. 
checkersGUI Provides the components for a GUI to allow a user to interact with the classes used to simulate a Checkers game. 
checkersMain Provides the main classes and interfaces needed to simulate a Checkers game. 
checkersPlayer Provides several implementations of the CheckersPlayerInterface. 
neuralNetwork Provides the basic abstract classes and interfaces for a feed-forward neural network. 
 

Classes in checkersMain used by checkersBoard
CheckersBoard
          This class is designed to hold data on the positioning and types of Checkers pieces on a CheckersBoard.
CheckersBoard.Ply
          A package class for a possible ply that can be taken for a CheckersBoard.
 

Classes in checkersMain used by checkersGUI
CheckersGameListener
          An interface that has methods the CheckersGameManager will call to notify a listener of CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvents.
CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent
          A simple event class that just holds the source of the CheckersGameEvent.
CheckersGameManager
          A Checkers game simulator that manages a game of checkers between two CheckersPlayerInterfaces.
CheckersPlayerInterface
          This is a basic interface that every checkers player should implement.
 

Classes in checkersMain used by checkersMain
CheckersBoard
          This class is designed to hold data on the positioning and types of Checkers pieces on a CheckersBoard.
CheckersBoard.Ply
          A package class for a possible ply that can be taken for a CheckersBoard.
CheckersGameListener
          An interface that has methods the CheckersGameManager will call to notify a listener of CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvents.
CheckersGameListener.CheckersGameEvent
          A simple event class that just holds the source of the CheckersGameEvent.
CheckersGameManager
          A Checkers game simulator that manages a game of checkers between two CheckersPlayerInterfaces.
CheckersPlayerInterface
          This is a basic interface that every checkers player should implement.
CheckersPlayerInterface.CheckersPlayerEvent
          A wrapper class that contains information the CheckersPlayerInterface needs without giving the CheckersPlayerInterface access to the CheckersGameManager .
 

Classes in checkersMain used by checkersPlayer
CheckersBoard
          This class is designed to hold data on the positioning and types of Checkers pieces on a CheckersBoard.
CheckersPlayerInterface
          This is a basic interface that every checkers player should implement.
CheckersPlayerInterface.CheckersPlayerEvent
          A wrapper class that contains information the CheckersPlayerInterface needs without giving the CheckersPlayerInterface access to the CheckersGameManager .
 

Classes in checkersMain used by neuralNetwork
CheckersBoard
          This class is designed to hold data on the positioning and types of Checkers pieces on a CheckersBoard.
